titleStmt.title: Twelve queries of publick concernment humbly submitted to the serious consideration of the Great Councell of the Kingdome. By a cordiall well-wisher to its proceedings.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for M. Spark at the Bible in Green Arbour,

notesStmt.note: A cordiall well-wisher to its proceedings = William Prynne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
